_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: ATLBot
author: jfeldt19@gmail.com

installation.script:
apk add --no-cache openssl

cd /mnt/server

wget https://github.com/ATLauncher/discord-bot/archive/master.zip

unzip master.zip

rm master.zip

mv discord-bot-master/* ./

mv config/config.json.example config/config.json

/usr/local/bin/npm install --production

/usr/local/bin/npm run build

rm -r discord-bot-master/
rm Dockerfile
rm CONTRIBUTING.md
rm README.md
rm /config/.gitignore
rm CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md

variables.name: client_token
variables.description: Get a discord token at https://discordapp.com/developers/
